author: Staff Reporter
text:
The deputy jailer of Attur Sub-jail, Shankaran (58), whose dance in full uniform was circulated in a video that surfaced on social media recently, was placed under suspension here on Tuesday.

Senthil Kumar, Superintendent, Salem Central Prison, served the order. Shankaran had recently taken part in the Republic Day parade in Chennai. The same night, he performed a dance at a hotel room that was videographed by his colleagues.

The video went viral on social media and the then Superintendent Shanmugasundaram conducted an inquiry. During the investigation, it came to light that a prisoner at Attur sub-jail was forced to give Shankaran a haircut and massage. Following this, Shankaran was transferred to Coimbatore Central Prison and Shanmugasundaram himself was transferred to the Central Prison, Vellore.
title: Deputy jailer placed under suspension
